message.body: Hi, my name is Meg..Rachel ###### gave me your number, I'd like to set up a massage appointment
Great! How soon? I have time Thursday @4p, Fri @10a or 3p & Sunday after 5p. I work from home & my add############################on/ reed. I charge $60-75m.
Hi Jess, I'm actually not going to have time until next Thursday, could that work for you? Next Thursday at four would be great!
Next thursday will be great- 4pm - I gave u my address- if anything changes let me know
Sounds great! I have been riding my bike to school in bryn mawr every day, and my back is definitely mad at me. See you Thursday!
Understand completely
Hey Jess, is there anyway we could push my appointment back to Friday at the same time? If that doesn't work I can still do Thursday!
I'm so sorry, I have someone scheduled at that time on Friday. I can see you sunday @3p if that is any better for you?
Oh that would be awesome, thanks!
Cool- so I'll see you Sunday 3p!
See you then!
Is our appt for 3 or 4p? Sorry I forget.
It was for three, but I can do either
4p would be great - thank you for your flexibility today
No problem!
Hi Jess, it's meg. how's school going? I'm hoping to set up an appointment for the week after my semester ends, what days are you free?
My semester ends on dec 18th- when does yours end?
My semester ends on dec 18th- when does yours end?
The 14th, and then I just have self scheduled exams. When would be good for you?
Anyday after the 18th- but no Monday's before 4p nor Friday's between 3p-9p. Any other day- time good.. Let me know- is it better for you day time or evening?
Can we do a Thursday morning?
Sure- 20th??? 10am?
Sounds great! Can't wait
Fabulous!!!
Hi there- just confirming for our appointment tomorrow- please remind me did we make it for 10am or 11am? My address is #####################- just in case :)
Hey there- if you are not able to make it tomorrow it is ok- just let me know please- one way or the other- Jess. Thank you :)
Sorry I was at a holiday party, yes we are still on, I am very much looking forward to it! I can do ten or eleven, whatever works for you!
I'd prefer 11a if that is ok!!!
Sure! See you then!
Great- lovely- see you tomorrow!
Yikes I just woke up. May be a few min behind - I'm sorry
Oh my! I just woke up too! I slept through three alarms on my phone apparently! Can we reschedule? I'm so sorry! Too much holiday party?!
Sure or you can come whenever -today maybe after 1p? Or saturday whatever- you tell me- I slept through 6 alarms- so I'm worse :)
Haha, is there like extra gravity today or something? Can we actually push it to next week, like Tuesday?
Sure i think that is xmas - I'll be here
Oh right, duh. How bout next Thursday, maybe at one, so we can sleep in? : )
Sounds great! See you @ 1p on 27th :)
Cool, thanks! Can't wait!
Me too- this is too funny! Tomorrow the world is supposed to end so if we make it see ya next week lol..
I will keep my fingers crossed!
Confirming tomorrow 1p I am also available later in the day if that is better, let me know :)
One is ok with me, if it is ok with you? I'm open all day really
1p great!!! See you tomorrow
Hey sorry to ask this -but can we do 2pm instead of 1pm? I have some stuff to do in the am- forgot about - this way I dont have to rush. Is 2p ok with you???
Yeah that is totally fine. Like I said my schedule is pretty easy tomorrow, so it could even be later if you need to!
Thank you- I really appreciate your flexibility!
Jess my turn to make a request, ha. Can we do three?
Sure! See you @3p!!
Thanks!
How are you getting here?
I think I'm going to drive, it's too cold for bike!
I agree that is why I was checking. I didnt know you had a car.
Yeah, it's a fairly recent purchase. Ella's dad just got here, leaving in a minute!
No problem- I have nothing on the books but you- so whenever you get here is fine! Please do not rush!
Ok, thanks!
Hey Jess, I want to make an appointment for my boyfriend, he is having some big time back pain. When is good for you? Anything tomorrow? Or today?
Hi, my parents are visiting today- so maybe this evening I could see him- if its ok to text when they have gone-most likely by 4/5p. Tomorrow I'm away.
Hey would Sunday work by any chance to see your boyfriend? Parents will be here for awhile & I doubt I'll be muich good to work after they leave. Let me know
Hey, no problem, have fun with your family! Nate says he could do Sunday, what time is good for you?
Evening like 4p?
Yes sounds great!
Fabulous see nate 4p sunday!!
Hey there can we push nate's appt to 430p by any chance??? I'd really appreciate it!!! Please let me know if that works?
Hey- send 2 more my way & you've earned yourself FREE session of Bodywork
Awesome!
He is so sweet!!
Isn't he great? I'm a pretty lucky lady ; )
Hey Jess, are you free this Thursday for massage?
2p? This Thursday? Your Free one -right?
Oh crap sorry wrong meg
But yes thursday is great
It's ok! Can we do it either in the am or early evening? I will be at school from 1-4
Sure is 10a ok?
Or would you rather come after class thursday?
Either is fine, lets go for ten, if that isn't too early?
Nope not too early- see you then :)
Cool, can't wait!
Me too :)
Confirming tomorrow 10a?
Yes!
Thanks love- see you then :)
Jess, I'm really sorry, but I need to reschedule, ella is staying home today. : (
No worries love
She has no idea how disappointed I am, ha ha
I'm sorry :(
Do you have any time tomorrow- if Ella is feeling better? I have someone scheduled 12-2pm, otherwise open. Let me know. Next week, wed, thur or same fri time.
Hmm, next week is a weird initiation thing at school, so I'm tied up, I might have to go for the Thursday after, so far away!
Well- just let me know... When you know
Hey there- my classes have been cancelled this weekend-so if you have any time open & want bodywork- just let me know- I'm here Sat&Sun.
Hey Jess, I'm on spring break so I finally have some free time. Are you free at all this week? Maybe Thursday?
Sure! That would be great! Let me know what time is best on Thursday!!
Any time after two is good for me!
How about 230p?
Yes!
Great see you then
Running a few minutes behind be there soon!
Take your time!!! So am I
Haha awesome
